TextView.android:text:
1) Click ''PLAY'' button to start the game.

2) For a new player, enter username to create an account.

3) Enter URL and click ''FETCH'' button to download the images.

4) Select any 6 images to play the game.

5) Flip the cards until all pairs are matched.

6) You can see how many pairs are matched in how much time taken at the top of the screen.

7) After all pairs had matched, YOU WIN!!

8) Then a Victory screen with how much time taken to win the game will be shown.

9) Click ''SUBMIT'' button to see your score in Leaderboard.

10) In Leaderboard, you can see Top 3 players along with other players ranked accordingly.
